programme.title: The meaning of Labor Day
programme.short_synopsis: The origins of the Labor Day holiday and the role of trade unions in the US.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke looks at the origins of Labor Day established in 1894, the diminishing role of trades unions and a cultural change in employment incentives and benefits in the US.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: The meaning of Labor Day

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
